arts.ttl: Blackpool boss Steve Bruce says abuse from Charlton Athletic supporter went ‘too far’
arts.sum: You know you’re going to get a bit of abuse, but when it’s like that, with kids around. “I wasn’t upset with the abuse he was giving me, I was upset with the language he was using in front of kids who were 10-years-old and have come to watch a game of football.

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Charlton Athletic 1 Blackpool 2 - Addicks slip to first home defeat as changes don’t pay off
arts.sum: Nathan Jones made tactical calls before the game to bring Rarmani Edmonds-Green in for Alex Mitchell at the back and Daniel Kanu for Tyreece Campbell up top. The Tangerines mastered the dark art of time-wasting after the break, aided by a referee who seemed intent of stopping the game for the softest of fouls every 15 seconds.

arts.ttl: Nathan Jones labels Charlton Athletic’s defeat to Blackpool as ‘farcical’ due to amount of stoppages in the game
arts.sum: “Frustration that we didn’t get two penalties and frustration with how the game was in the second-half as the game became farcical. Then frustration in the second-half because we didn’t demonstrate enough quality.

arts.ttl: Blackpool hold on to beat Charlton
arts.sum: A late Luke Berry effort was not enough to overturn an own goal from Gassan Ahadme and an Albie Morgan strike.
